BlackNightmare:

"You will do it all right"said the femme witha big smile"I'm sure 
about that!!!"

After few seconds Nightstrike and Darkfate reported and waited 
orders+

"Is this a report or an invitation to watch a date?"said 
sarcastically Nightstrike
